title: U.S. targeted Islamic State's al-Baghdadi: official
text:
U.S. targeted Islamic State's al-Baghdadi: official

Politics 15 minutes ago (Oct 27, 2019 12:07AM ET)

WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The United States has carried out an operation targeting Islamic State leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, a U.S. official told Reuters, speaking on condition of anonymity. The official did not disclose details of the operation and did not say whether it was successful. Other U.S. officials contacted by Reuters declined comment. Newsweek, citing a U.S. Army official briefed on the result of the operation, said al-Baghdadi was killed in the raid.

U.S. targeted Islamic State's al-Baghdadi: official
description: U.S. targeted Islamic State's al-Baghdadi: official
